intro: Psychotria hedyotifolia, commonly known as the "Java Psychotria," is a flowering plant native to Southeast Asia. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant typically grows as an erect shrub with opposite, ovate leaves that are often covered in fine hairs. Its small, white flowers are clustered in dense inflorescences, and it produces small, red berries that are edible but have a mild, spicy flavor. It is often found in moist, shaded areas of tropical forests.
